data.name: Ribby: The Game
data.detailed_description:
It's Ribby: The Game! An RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about finding yourself, acceptance, and frogs! Ribbit.

Use empathy and the power of kindness to resolve the issues of the potential friends you'll meet along your journey, or take the more harsh approach and murder them with words. Not literally, though. Just in case you were worried.

Follow Ribby Croaks, an altruistic girl on an emotional journey to get back to her hometown after being ditched in a swamp by some school bullies. Along the way you'll meet tons of potential buddies that have their own problems and issues to work through, but just can't seem to on their own. Choose to help them and become friends forever, or exacerbate the things they're dealing with.

Speak what you feel, but be prepared to face the consequences.



Trailer Music by: https://magic-spark.itch.io/
Cover Art by: https://twitter.com/figburn

(Warning) This Game May Make You Feel Like:


  • Smiling
  • Having fun
  • Telling all your friends about it

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

movies.name: RIbby: The Game Steam Reveal Trailer

content_descriptors.notes: Themes of abandonment and anxiety. Mild swearing/adult language. Mentions of alcohol and drug use.
